name: 99999 (Demo)
description:
99999 is a fast-paced, high-score, multi-stage arena-shooter inspired by Super Crate Box. 

Similar to Super Crate Box, you earn points by collecting weapons. The enemies will just keep coming, so score as many points as you can before you get overwhelmed!

 

Unlock a large variety of weapons as you progress through the game. 

Multiple stages and enemies to deal with.

Equip abilities, utilise different strategies and customise your play-style.

STEAM PAGE is up!
Wishlist helps a lot in discovery so please consider wishlisting if you're interested!

99999 is currently still in development, but you can try out the demo build (v2.0) below!
